accepted_predicates.device_name: Mepilex Border Ag Antimicrobial Foam Dressing
accepted_predicates.notes: Same product code (FRO), same device class (U — combination product with OTC drug), polyurethane foam + silver antimicrobial construction, same wound indications

se_conclusion: HealGuard-Ag is substantially equivalent to K243166 (Mepilex Border Ag). Both devices are antimicrobial polyurethane foam wound dressings with a silver-based drug component, cleared under product code FRO. Device-led combination product; drug component (silver sulfadiazine 1%) is OTC-monograph compliant per 21 CFR 333 Subpart D.
reviewer_notes: Combination product (device primary mode of action). Drug component must comply with OTC antimicrobial monograph (21 CFR 333). Separate drug CMC package not required for monograph-compliant OTC drug components. Class U — no predicate regulation number required. Shelf life testing with accelerated aging and moisture barrier validation required.
